colrectr 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference
  • Articles
    • How To Use

    How To Use

    how-to-use.Rmd

    Workflow

    Load colrectr

    library(colrectr)

    Read Excel file specifying path and sheet.

    colrect(path = "../inst/extdata/clustered.xlsx",
        sheet = "降水量",
        col = 3)
#> # A tibble: 107 x 29
